name: GirlsTris
description:
GirlsTris - It is a classic Tetris, the purpose of which is to arrange the shapes so that all the cells of the same row were filled.

When you reach a certain number of points you will receive awards.

Control


A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Move Down

W - Move Up

Space Bar - Instantly Lower

← - Rotate Left

→ - Rotate Right

Escape - Menu/Pause

Space Bar - Action in Menu

Features


  • 20+ Arts
  • Relaxing music
  • Two modes
